title: Launching CastroHub
content: Today I launched CastroHub, a dream I have been working on to combine education, news, and entertainment into one hub.

title: Learning Tailwind & AOS
content: Experimented with TailwindCSS and scroll animations (AOS). They’ve completely changed how my pages feel!

title: My First Research Project
content: Conducted a study on student dropout rates at St. Peter’s Mumias Boys High School. It shaped my passion for education research.
